questions.question: What HTML5 element defines navigation links?
What element defines independent self-contained content?
What element groups related content in a document?
What element defines a footer for a document or section?
What element defines a header for a document or section?
What element embeds external content like videos?
questions.explanation: iframe embeds external web pages or content.

questions.question: What attribute specifies unique identifiers for elements?
What attribute specifies element classes for styling?
questions.explanation: class groups elements for CSS styling.

questions.question: What element defines data lists for input suggestions?
What element displays scalar measurements within a range?
questions.explanation: meter shows gauges with known min/max values.
